archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Track & Manage Service Provisioning
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Ensure service provisioning activities are assigned, managed and tracked efficiently.

properties.value: The objective of the Track & Manage Service Provisioning processes is to ensure service provisioning activities are assigned, managed and tracked efficiently. Responsibilities of these processes include, but are not limited to: â€¢ Scheduling, assigning and coordinating service provisioning related activities; â€¢ Generating the respective resource order creation request(s) to Issue Resource Orders based on specific service orders; â€¢ Escalating status of service orders in accordance with local policy; â€¢ Undertaking necessary tracking of the execution process; â€¢ Adding additional information to an existing service order; â€¢ Modifying information in an existing service order;â€¢ â€¢ Modifying the service order status; â€¢ Canceling a service order when the initiating customer order is cancelled; â€¢ Monitoring the jeopardy status of service orders, and escalating service orders as necessary â€¢ Indicating completion of a service order by modifying the service order status. Note that some specific service components may be delivered by other parties. In these cases the Track & Manage Service Provisioning process is responsible for initiating requests, through Party Order handling for the delivery by the party of the specific service components.
